PHRASE.LANG: You've never had gloves as comfortable as these! [#Legal]
Vous n'avez jamais eu des gants aussi confortables que ceux-là ! [#Legal]
So bequeme Handschuhe haben Sie noch nie besessen! [#Legal]
Non hai mai avuto dei guanti così comodi! [#Legal]
¡Nunca te has probado unos guantes así de cómodos! [#Legal]
You've never had gloves as comfortable as these! [#Legal]
